name: Plethora of Bullets
description:
A never ending (hopefully) round of spawning enemies attacking the player. 

FPS

Bullet Hell

Early modeling and design demo. Stick around for the progressive builds and leave suggestions and comments on the board.

Gameplay Instructions:

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Back

D - Right

Ctrl - Crouch

Space - Jump

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Scope

Mouse - Look Around

The demo is going to updated with objectives, score and health hud as well as enemy attacks in the near future.
